Text:
Now i know nearly all of em... BUT... what on earth is a PDVDrip?!!!

Preview DVDrip???
thenx sam as always..bt some more seeds plz..its takes too long for downloading...ny idea how it can make faster

@drewkrew :
From what I've heard, the P stands for Pre. As in, not retail released yet. However, I've only ever seen it in reference to Bollywood movies.

PDVD - P stands for Pirated not Pre  :)

PDVDs are usually sold by movie bootleggers. A PDVD is usually an asian silver or, telesync copy of a movie, that has been encoded to DVD. Quality varies of course. PDVDs are widely availible throughout some countries at an extremely low price.

For more.. click below link:

http://www.afterdawn.com/glossary/term.cfm/pdvd

Thanks guy's. 
I've finished the download and it's a CAM source, so in my opinion it's a bit taboo to use DVDrip in the title of a torrent thats clearly a CAM but if it is labelled as PiratedDVDrip then i guess thats fair enough and it should have been me that realised it was potentially a cam source and not a true DVDrip or variant upon that.
Thanks once again.
